GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

errors.400: responds with an error if invalid query parameters are passed

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: fetches an article by its id

errors.400: responds with an error if the article_id is not a valid number
errors.404: responds with an error if no article is found with the given article_id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves all comments for an article, sorted by most recent comment
